mapper.insert: insert into bill (BId, BType, BNum, BPrice, BMonth, BTitle, BDate) values (#{bid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{btype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bmonth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{btitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bdate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update bill set BType = #{btype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BNum = #{bnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BPrice = #{bprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BMonth = #{bmonth,jdbcType=CHAR}, BTitle = #{btitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BDate = #{bdate,jdbcType=DATE} where BId = #{bid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select BId, BType, BNum, BPrice, BMonth, BTitle, BDate from bill
